title: Doesn't work as advertised, more work than using standard light switches.
text:
"Automatically turns on and off as you enter and leave" 
This doesn't work. Yes it will turn off when it stops receiving Bluetooth signal, but it doesn't turn back on until you run the app. 

So you have to get your phone out and run the app, even if you already had it running you have to refresh it. 

iPhone also shuts down Bluetooth when the screen is locked, so your lights will turn off automatically unless you disable the auto-lock which is ridiculous. If you aren't going to lock your screen, you're not going to put your phone in your pocket or bag. And you don't want to have to go into the settings and change the auto lock every time you leave and return. 

In short, poor design. At $30-40 per bulb it's a waste of money. It's so much easier to use a light switch which completely defeats the purpose of automation technology.

title: Love this LED lightbulb and app!
text:
Decided to try this LED lightbulb that can be controlled with my iPhone5. Really happy with the results as its super easy to set up and use through the app without having to jump through hoops.

Here are the things that I really like about the product:
1.) Works great
2.) It's an LED lightbulb and works just like an ordinary lightbulb if you don't want to get fancy.
3.) Easy to discover the lightbulb and configure and control through the app on my phone.
4.) Dimmer control on the phone, which I often use due to where the lightbulb is situated in my house.
5.) Timer control where you can set when the light should be on and off. I've had a manual plug-in timer for this previously that is now retired.

There are other interesting features that I have not yet played with.

Looking forward to future versions from Smart Home Labs for outdoors use, recessed lighting, etc. Great stuff!!

title: This is the future - Amazing, Sleek and Robust!
text:
I am simply amazed by the robustness and efficiency of this awesome app. 

Unlike many other bulb apps, this app uses Bluetooth to connect to bulbs and is far more advanced than any other Bluetooth bulbs currently available . 

You can set timers , schedule bulbs to turn on and off automatically as you move around. 

It just knows when you are around and does what expect and beyond!

I love the timer feature. This app is extremely impressive, responsive and user intuitive . 

I am really excited to get more bulbs. They are worth every penny ! I absolutely love it !

I just got my bulbs last week and I am extremely satisfied with the superb quality of this amazing app and the bulbs!
